extendedInfo.description: You ever wanted that android stock agenda widget to be more functional? - Display multiple appointments- Scroll-able- Scale-able- Agenda view- Calendar view- etcNow you can with the Launcher Pro Android Stock Calendar Widget Skin!All credits for making Launcher Pro and Launcher Pro theming possible go to Federico!Requirements: Launcher Pro Plus (recommended)Instructions:Apply the theme by opening LauncherPro and pressing Menu > Preferences > LP Widget Settings, then choose the widget you want to apply the skin to, press âSelect Skinâ and pick one of your installed skins. After restarting LauncherPro, the widget should have the skin applied!Requests can be sent to my email!
